name: Questr
description: Manage a party of personalities on epic (and goofy) quests. Swipe right on who you like. Swipe left on who you don't. Watch out for liars and be careful how you spend your gold! Of course there's plenty of exciting encounters along the way. Can you keep everyone happy while turning a nice profit?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Intel or AMD equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2500 MB available space
